scripts.publishPatch: npm version patch -m "version update to %s" && npm publish --access public
scripts.publishMinor: npm version minor -m "version update to %s" && npm publish --access public
scripts.publishMajor: npm version major -m "version update to %s" && npm publish --access public
scripts.buildWindowsBin: npx pkg -o bin/windows/skyhook.exe -t node12-win-x64 . && cd bin/windows && zip -q ./skyhook-cli-windows-x64.zip skyhook.exe && cd ../..
scripts.buildLinuxBin: npx pkg -o bin/linux/skyhook -t node12-linux-x64 . && cd bin/linux && zip -q ./skyhook-cli-linux-x64.zip skyhook && cd ../..
scripts.buildMacosBin: npx pkg -o bin/macos/skyhook -t node12-macos-x64 . && cd bin/macos && zip -q ./skyhook-cli-macos-x64.zip skyhook && cd ../..
scripts.buildAllBins: npm run buildWindowsBin; npm run buildLinuxBin; npm run buildMacosBin
